main event: A civilian pilot observed a large oval-shaped object with a bright star-like light varying in intensity over Montebello, Virginia on February 6, 1963.
interesting points: The object appeared to hover for about 30 minutes and then disappeared over a ridge., The light varied in size during the observation., The sighting lasted a total of 45 minutes., A NASA test aircraft was operating in the area, which might have been misidentified as the UFO., There were no clouds, and visibility was unlimited at the time of the sighting.
sighted object: large oval-shaped object with a bright star-like light
